text: Waterloo () is a 1970 war movie directed by Sergei Bondarchuk and produced by Dino De Laurentiis. It is about the Battle of Waterloo. It stars Rod Steiger as Napoleon Bonaparte and Christopher Plummer as the Duke of Wellington with a cameo by Orson Welles as Louis XVIII of France. ==References== Category:1970s epic movies Category:1970 war movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:Russian war movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1810s Category:Movies set in France Category:Movies set in Belgium Category:Movies set in palaces Category:Movies directed by Sergei Bondarchuk Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970 drama movies Category:Movies based on real life events
